name: HELLO PENGUIN 3d CHAPTER 1
description: Penguin is here.  Here in the void, I have found it.  After ten years pouring over my two tomes, I have found Penguin.  There is something present here, something wrong with the air.  It is heavy with joy, misty with rage, and arid with fear.   Penguin is here.  I am shaking.  Penguin seems intent but I do not know on what.  It surveys the lands, not as if searching, but as if scouring every possibility at once.  I can not comprehend what is happening.  Penguin is here?
